coverpage.title: Hi, I'm Orlando Mina
coverpage.about: I am a frontend developer with experience in React. I'm good at HTML and CSS, as well as JavaScript. I love learning new things and experimenting with new technologies. I have a good eye for details and I always put my all into my work.

about.title: About me
about.text: Orlando is a frontend developer with an interest in UX/UI design. He is an expert in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.
about.bio: Hey, I'm Orlando. I like to play music and build things with code. I'm a systems engineer student at the Antonio Jose Camacho University (UNIAJC). I'm a 20 years old colombian guy. I like to play videogames and watch eSports competitions when I have time.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Here are some of my projects. I'm always working on new things, so check back later for updates.
